name: neodb
description: Neodb is a social cataloging platform for movies, books, and music inspired by Douban. It enables self-hosted users to track and rate media collections with feeds, comments, and lists.
features: Media cataloging: Track movies, books, music, games, and podcasts in a unified collection.
Rating system: Rate and review media with customizable scoring and written feedback.
Activity feeds: Follow other users and see their reviews, ratings, and collection updates.
Lists and collections: Organize media into custom lists like watchlists, favorites, or themed collections.
Social features: Comment on reviews, like posts, and interact with other users' content.
Import/export: Migrate data from Douban or other platforms with bulk import tools.
Metadata fetching: Automatically retrieve information, covers, and details from external databases.
Progress tracking: Mark media as watching, reading, or listening with progress indicators.
Recommendations: Discover new content based on your ratings and similar users' preferences.
Privacy controls: Set visibility for reviews and collections as public, followers-only, or private.
Search and filters: Find media by title, creator, genre, year, or other attributes.
ActivityPub support: Connect with federated social networks for broader content sharing.
